languages.text: "Но..." {n}Блюститель подавляет слова протеста и покорно продолжает:{/n} "В таком случае прошу вас сохранять бдительность. Составы на грузовой магистрали двигаются на огромной скорости, а обитатели жилых ячеек... презренная чернь, с которой надо держать ухо востро. И да убережет вас Император ненароком попасть в моровую яму, где обретаются безумцы и прокаженные".

traits.locale_text: "Но..." {n}Блюститель подавляет слова протеста и покорно продолжает:{/n} "В таком случае прошу вас сохранять бдительность. Составы на грузовой магистрали двигаются на огромной скорости, а обитатели жилых ячеек... презренная чернь, с которой надо держать ухо востро. И да убережет вас Император ненароком попасть в моровую яму, где обретаются безумцы и прокаженные".

languages.text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid-protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."
languages.original_text: "Но..." {n}Блюститель подавляет слова протеста и покорно продолжает:{/n} "В таком случае прошу вас сохранять бдительность. Составы на грузовой магистрали двигаются на огромной скорости, а обитатели жилых ячеек... презренная чернь, с которой надо держать ухо востро. И да убережет вас Император ненароком попасть в моровую яму, где обретаются безумцы и прокаженные".

traits.locale_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself from protesting and continues obediently,{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

"In that case I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble one must never drop one's guard around. And in some corners, you might come across misfits and outcasts who are unsafe to even approach, being contagious."

"But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

"But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

languages.text: "Aber ..." {n}Frensoe gibt seinen Protest auf und schlägt einen fügsameren Ton an.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, solltet Ihr wachsam bleiben. Die Güterzüge fahren sehr schnell und die Bewohner der Wohneinheiten sind ... widerlicher Abschaum. Man darf in ihrer Nähe niemals unachtsam sein. Und möge der Imperator verhindern, dass Ihr in die Pestgrube stolpert ... dort leben die Wahnsinnigen und Leprösen."
languages.original_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid-protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ..." {n}Frensoe gibt seinen Protest auf und schlägt einen fügsameren Ton an.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, solltet Ihr wachsam bleiben. Die Güterzüge fahren sehr schnell und die Bewohner der Wohneinheiten sind ... widerlicher Abschaum. Mnn darf in ihrer Nähe niemals unachtsam sein. Und möge der Imperator verhindern, dass Ihr in die Pestgrube stolpert ... dort leben die Wahnsinnigen und Leprösen."

"Wenn das so ist, solltet Ihr wachsam bleiben. Der Güterzug fährt sehr schnell und die Bewohner der Wohneinheiten sind ... widerlich. Mann darf niemals unachtsam sein. In einigen Ecken trefft Ihr möglicherweise sogar auf ansteckendes Gesindel und Ausgestoßene, denen man sich nicht einmal ungefährdet nähern kann."

languages.text: « Mais... » {n}Sur le point de protester, Frensoe s'interrompt et reprend aussitôt un ton plus conciliant.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous invite à faire preuve de prudence. Les trains de marchandises circulent à grande vitesse et les habitants des unités résidentielles ne sont... qu'un ramassis de racailles. Mieux vaut rester sur ses gardes en toute circonstance. Par ailleurs... puisse l'Empereur vous empêcher de tomber sur la fosse aux pestilences, où vivent les fous à lier et les lépreux. »
languages.original_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid-protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

traits.locale_text: « Mais... » {n}Sur le point de protester, Frensoe s'interrompt et reprend aussitôt un ton plus conciliant.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous invite à faire preuve de prudence. Les trains de marchandises circulent à grande vitesse et les habitants des unités résidentielles ne sont... qu'un ramassis de racailles. Mieux vaut rester sur ses gardes en toute circonstance. Par ailleurs... puisse l'Empereur vous empêcher de tomber sur la fosse aux pestilences, où vivent les fous à lier et les lépreux. »

« Dans ce cas, je vous invite à faire preuve de prudence. Les trains de marchandises circulent à grande vitesse et les habitants des unités résidentielles ne sont... qu'un ramassis de racailles. Mieux vaut rester sur ses gardes en toute circonstance. Et vous risquez de croiser ici ou là des marginaux ou des parias contagieux qu'il serait fort imprudent d'approcher. »

languages.text: «Pero...». {n}Frensoe deja inacabada la protesta y adopta un tono más obediente.{/n} «En tal caso, le ruego que permanezca alerta. Los trenes de transporte circulan a gran velocidad, y los habitantes de las unidades residenciales son... una chusma deleznable. No se puede bajar la guardia con ellos. Y quiera el Emperador que no acabe usted en el pozo de pestilencia; allí viven los locos y los leprosos».
languages.original_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid-protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

traits.locale_text: «Pero...». {n}Frensoe deja inacabada la protesta y adopta un tono más obediente.{/n} «En tal caso, le ruego que permanezca alerta. Los trenes de transporte circulan a gran velocidad, y los habitantes de las unidades residenciales son... una chusma deleznable. No se puede bajar la guardia con ellos. Y quiera el Emperador que no acabe usted en el pozo de pestilencia; allí viven los locos y los leprosos».

«En tal caso, le ruego que permanezca alerta. Los trenes de transporte circulan a gran velocidad, y los habitantes de las unidades residenciales son... una chusma deleznable. No se puede bajar la guardia con ellos. Y en algunos rincones podría toparse con parias y enfermos a los que no es seguro acercarse siquiera».

languages.text: 「ですが…」{n}フレンソーは抗議の声を途中で止め、より従順な口調になる。{/n}「その場合は、警戒を怠らないようにお願いします。貨物列車は猛スピードで走っていますし、居住区の住人は…卑しい輩ばかりです。決して油断なさらないでください。そして、皇帝のご加護あれ。どうか疫病の穴には間違っても足を踏み入れられませんように。あそこには狂人やハンセン病患者がいますので」
languages.original_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが…」{n}フレンソーは抗議の声を途中で止め、より従順な口調になる。{/n}「その場合は、警戒を怠らないようにお願いします。貨物列車は猛スピードで走っていますし、居住区の住人は…卑しい輩ばかりです。決して油断なさらないでください。そして、皇帝のご加護あれ。どうか疫病の穴には間違っても足を踏み入れられませんように。あそこには狂人やハンセン病患者がいますので」
「その場合は、警戒を怠らないようにお願いします。貨物列車は猛スピードで動きますし、居住区の住人は…卑しい輩ばかりです。決して油断なさらないでください。そして場所によっては、近づくことすらも危険な伝染性の病に侵された社会不適合者や追放者に出くわす可能性もあります」

languages.text: “可……”{n}弗伦索立刻止住了反对的话语，以更加顺从的语调开了口。{/n}“如果是这样的话，我希望您能保持警惕。货运列车在船上飞奔而过，而那里的居民……全都是卑劣的乌合之众，再怎么警惕都不为过。还有，帝皇保佑，您千万别接近疫病坑，那里是疯子和麻风病人的住处。”
languages.original_text: "But—" {n}Frensoe stops himself mid protest and assumes a more compliant tone.{/n} "In that case, I urge you to remain vigilant. The freight trains move at great speeds, and the inhabitants of the residential units are... despicable rabble. One must never drop one's guard around them. And Emperor preserve you from stumbling into the pestilence pit — that's where the madmen and the lepers live."

traits.locale_text: “可……”{n}弗伦索立刻止住了反对的话语，以更加顺从的语调开了口。{/n}“如果是这样的话，我希望您能保持警惕。货运列车在船上飞奔而过，而那里的居民……全都是卑劣的乌合之众，再怎么警惕都不为过。还有，帝皇保佑，您千万别接近疫病坑，那里是疯子和麻风病人的住处。”
“如果是这样的话，我希望您能保持警惕。货运列车在您的船上飞驰，而那里的居民……全都是卑鄙的乌合之众，再怎么警惕都不为过。还有，在某些角落里，您可能会遇到流浪者和被放逐的人。那些人身上都有传染病，哪怕仅仅是接近他们都相当不安全。”
